critique: This document is an executive order that withdraws public lands in Arizona for use by the War Department as an aerial gunnery range. It was issued in 1941, during a national defense emergency. It prioritizes national security by providing land for military training. It does not directly address immigration, civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. It could be seen as expanding executive power to some extent, but it also respects existing rights and previous orders. It centralizes control of the land in the federal government.
